title: Sr Android Application Developer
jobDescription:
Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform

  1. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
  2. To use and work with outside APIs and data sources
  3. To perform unit test to ensure usability, robustness, edge cases and general reliability
  4. To work and make sure improved application performance and bug fixing
  5. Continuous evaluation, discovery and implementation of new technologies to maximize the efficiency of development.
  6. Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
  7. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
  8. Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  9. Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  10. Ability to design applications around natural user interfaces, such as touch
  11. Familiarity with the use of additional sensors, such as gyroscopes and accelerometers
  12. Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
  13. Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  14. Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  15. A knack for benchmarking and optimization
  16. Understanding of Google s Android design principles and interface guidelines
  17. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
  18. Familiarity with continuous integration
  19. Familiarity with continuous integration
  20. Push Notifications Implementation
  21. Payment Gateway Integration.
Desired Skills Experience
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical field from a reputed college.
  • Fluency in the Java programming language / specifically on the Android platform
  • Experience writing flexible layouts for different screen sizes/densities/orientations
  • Understanding of Android Studio, JAVA, Json
  • General CS background, understand basic algorithms as well as comprehension of mobile specific problems.
  • Working experience in Kotlin
  • Knowledge in the integration of any third-party libraries.
  • Comprehension and experience with client/server architectures
  • Extensive Knowledge on thread handling in a multithreaded environment
  • Knowledge on design patterns like MVP, MVVM
  • Knowledge of writing unit test cases using JUnit, Mokito and Espresso
  • Good to have knowledge on Rx Java, Retrofit and integration of third party library.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Your work experience includes having worked at small- or medium-sized companies

title: Web Application Developer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Asset Online Private Limited Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for passionate, self-motivated technical individuals that have the desire and capability to think outside the box to solve complex problems. AOPL is seeking very talented Software Developers with an emphasis on C# using Visual Studio. This role will require the applicant to work within a tight team to design, develop and maintain data-driven software solutions including advanced RFID/NFC, Web, Mobile (iOS, Android, WP8) and Windows Desktop applications against MS-SQL Server and SQLite databases.
EXPERTISE
  • Dot net , c#, MVC, API service development , MS sql server.
  • 1-3+ years of software engineering experience with .Net, C#
  • experience in building application APIs with REST services.
  • experience with web services and Entity framework
  • Experience building applications with data storage, data persistence and caching concepts using SQL and NoSQL technologies (SQL Server, MongoDB).
  • Working experience with Agile software development methods, scrum a plus.
  • Knowledge of software engineering best practices (Agile software development, test- driven development, unit testing, code reviews, design documentation, continuous Integration, continuous delivery) and experience to setup, configure and maintain a dev/build environment..
  • Knowledge of performance optimization techniques
  • Strong problem-solving skills and assist Product Support teams in solving customer problems as needed.
  • Perform code reviews, create unit and integration tests, etc.
  • Understanding of writing good specifications, understanding requirements, and project management roles
  • Researching and exploring how to use new technologies and platforms.
  • Be a self-starter comfortable working in a fast-paced environment
  • Must be able to collaborate with other programmers and help ensure successful team- based delivery
  • The developer is accountable for product tests to develop strong value propositions
  • This role will ensure data integrity by characterizing RFID product in RFID encoding systems and developing encode parameters.
  • This position has direct customer interaction to understand use cases and tagging requirements
  • Translate customer requirements into design of experiments to define and recommend RFID and IoT solutions.
  • Consult with market development managers sales team and customers with application testing and product recommendation
  • Responsible for the collection and analysis of customer and partner feedback on product samples
  • Required system hardware/software setup and integration Experience
Qualifications
  • Bachelors degree with 1+ years engineering research scientific or related experience required, masters degree preferred
  • Experienced with application engineering processes: collect data interpret data translate to real world benefits and outcomes
  • Experience with RFID Wireless Communications protocols analog and power circuits and computer programming.
  • Skilled with applicable computer systems such as Microsoft Office Google Applications and function specific software.
  • Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new situations, demonstrated effectively working with cross functional teams
  • Keen interest in new technologies and their applications
  • Keen attention to detail, strong written and oral communication skills with ability to be an advisor to clients and build strong and sustainable relationships
